titles.title: You Lord, Alone, Are Who We Love

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You Lord, alone, are who we love. You Lord, alone, are who we love. Jesus alone, Jesus alone – Always you Lord, alone we love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You Lord, alone, are who we trust. You Lord, alone, are who we trust. Jesus alone, Jesus alone – Always You Lord, alone, we trust.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dear Lord, we follow You alone. Dear Lord, we follow You alone. Jesus alone, Jesus alone Dear Lord, we follow You alone. Always You Lord, alone we love.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Juhnem – an sa-rang ham-ne-dah. Juhnem – an sa-rang ham-ne-dah. Ea’su – nem – an, Ea’su -nem -an, Un-jay-na sa-rang ham-ne-dah.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Juhnem -an ue’je ham-ne-dah. Juhnem – an ue’je ham-ne-dah. Ea’su -nem – an, Ea’su -nem -an, Un-jay-na ue’je, ham-ne-dah.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Juhnem-an da-ra gam-ne-dah. Juhnem – an da-ra gam -ne-dah. Ea’su-nem – an, Ea’su – nem -an, Un-jay -na da-ra gam-ne-dah.{/lang-eng}
